    • AddToStack

      public void AddToStack(Card addedCard)
      Adds a card to stack, checks for responses, then begins resolving the cards. It does this by popping them, then calling their play method. If a card isnt valid because it has been canceled by a nope card, it wont resolve.
      Parameters:
      addedCard -

    • CheckForResponses

      public void CheckForResponses(String target)
      Right now this does nothing, but it is supposed to ask each player if they want to play a response card (nope, defuser).
      Parameters:
      target -
